abstract: The economic downturn has led to an increase in pay-per-click advertising, and in the use of false clicks to make money for the Web sites that carry the ads.
snippet: The economic downturn has led to an increase in pay-per-click advertising, and in the use of false clicks to make money for the Web sites that carry the ads.
lead_paragraph: GIVEN the state of the automobile industry and the economy, it is understandably a rough time to run a company called NewCars.com, a subsidiary of Cars.com.

headline.main: Pay-Per-Click Web Advertisers Combat Costly Fraud
headline.print_headline: Pay-Per-Click Web Advertisers Combat Costly Fraud
